      private static void Gameplay.landOnSquare(Square currentSquare, Player currentPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, java.util.ArrayList<Square> squares)
      Actions that occur when landing on a square depending on the current square details and player balance.

      Includes:
      - paying fines;
      - removing a player if the fine causes them to drop below 0;
      - square purchase validation checks.

      Checks if player has passed the Global Earth Day square and adds money if necessary.

      Class that facilitates fine payments between players.
